aboutUs.subtitle: Meet the passionate developers behind this innovative to-do list application. We are dedicated students working together to create amazing digital experiences that help people organize their lives more effectively.
aboutUs.teamMembersSubtitle: Each member brings unique skills and perspectives to make this project successful

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our diverse team brings together different perspectives, skills, and experiences to create innovative solutions. We believe in collaboration, continuous learning, and delivering high-quality software that makes a real difference in people's daily lives.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Working together to achieve common goals
